knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.width = 19, fig.height = 7)

### {.tabset} 

```{r tabs, results='asis'}

tabs <- c("dichot", "detail")

for(tab in tabs) {

  cat('\n')
  cat('#### ', str_to_title(tab), '   \n')
  cat('\n')

  select_plots <- keep(all_plots, str_detect(names(all_plots), paste0('^', tab, '.*')))

  walk(select_plots, ~print(.x))

  cat('\n')
}

```
